It's addressed to him, but it's thick. Heavy with secrets, I bet. I can feel it in my hands. It feels like a bad omen, you know? Like whatever's inside is going to ruin everything.

I can feel the panic rising in me. My heart's pounding like I've just run a marathon. This is it, isn't it? The thing that's going to destroy our marriage. It's all falling apart before I even know what's inside.

No, no, that can't be it. Not with how long this has been sitting here unopened. This is something big. Something awful. I know it. I just know it.

I can't open it now. Not when I'm like this. But later... Later, I'll find out what's inside. And then... Then everything will change. Everything always does.*
